name: Cake Quest (janus1001)
description:
Use your shoulders for something else than cutting in line!

In this game, you will be defending your Granny from mafia in the shop. You may even discover the past of your Gran!

Find ingredients by looking at store employees put them in the shelves!

Bump into people to stop them in their tracks.

Use Keys for movement and spacebar for progressing dialog.

Credits:

Everything that looks good, https://www.kenney.nl/

Everything that sounds good, https://freepd.com/
